sentences.english: The article forecasts well applications of steel tube truss structure.
sentences.chinese: 展望管桁結構有着良好的應用前景。

sentences.english: When they reached an harbour, the sailors clewed the mainsail down.
sentences.chinese: 當他們抵達一個港口時，水手們落下了帆桁。

sentences.english: To make sails and yards ready for sailing.
sentences.chinese: 咱們把帆繫到桁上去吧。

sentences.english: The captain asked the sailors to clew dowm.
The captain asked the sailors to clew ( the sails ) up.
sentences.chinese: 船長命令船員們引帆上桁。

sentences.english: Pillars are used to support deck girders, longitudinal or transverse.
sentences.chinese: 柱子用於支撐甲板縱桁，縱向或橫向。

sentences.english: Your upper body and shoulders should be parallel to the booms.
sentences.chinese: 身體上半部分和肩膀應該和帆下桁平行。
